title: I never start a game
body: What can i do if I never start a game and it keeps telling me I left a game and I must reconnect

replies.body: It sounds like you're having trouble connecting to the game server, and stuck at reconnect until the match is over.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, and not only get you back in game but to prevent further cases like this.  Let me know if you have any questions.
